title: 10 Questions to Ask Doctor About GERD
author: WebMD Editorial Contributors

content: Since you’ve recently been diagnosed with GERD, ask your doctor these questions at your next visit:
bullets: Is my case mild, moderate, or severe?
Could medications I take be causing my GERD symptoms ?
If I have chest pain , how can I tell whether it's GERD or a heart problem?
Are there foods or beverages I should avoid?
Are there other lifestyle changes that might help my symptoms?
Should I take medication? If so, do I need a prescription?
What side effects could the medication cause?
What should I do if the medication doesn't seem to help?
Will I need any tests or examinations?
What complications could occur if my GERD doesn't improve?
